app.name: Pressure Sensor App using DPS310
app.description:
Disclaimer: This is a community code example (CCE) released for the benefit of the community users. These projects have only been tested for the listed BSPs, tools versions and toolchains documented in the Readme.

This example demonstrates how to interface the Infineon DPS310 pressure sensors evaluation board with PSoC6 MCU. The sensor-xensive-dps3xx library is used in this example for initializing and reading of temperature and pressure data from the DPS310 Barometric pressure sensor.

For more details, see the README on GitHub.
